Notes: Usually not visible but they get activated by Bowser's attacks. Once it appears, it falls down onto ground. Then, it becomes a yellow orb that can be smashed into Bowser. Depending on the encounter number, it can also emit shockwaves.

Obj_arg0.Name: Bowser Encounter Number
Obj_arg0.Description: If greater than 1, the rock will emit a purple quake wave once it lands.
